title: The Birth of Moses
summary: Exodus 2 tells of Moses’ birth and how his mother hides him from Pharaoh’s order. He is discovered and adopted by Pharaoh’s daughter. Later, Moses kills an Egyptian and flees to Midian, where he marries Zipporah.

faq.question: How was Moses saved as a baby?
faq.answer: His mother placed him in a basket in the Nile, and Pharaoh’s daughter found and adopted him.

faq.question: Why did Moses flee Egypt?
faq.answer: Because he killed an Egyptian who was beating a Hebrew, and Pharaoh sought to kill him.
